name: Track Turmoil
description:
Track Turmoil is a small but fun racing game with 10 maps, and 10 cars. All unlocked to begin with. You race with 5 AI cars on each map, three laps per race.

Enjoy the Toy-Town colors, the low-poly style, the fun physics, and the snappy controls.

I made the models in Blender, and the game in Godot. Music by Atri Biswas.
